#include<stdio.h>
#include<string.h>
 
int main()
{
    int i,T,Len,Alice,Bob;
    char print1[] = "ALICE";
    char print2[] = "BOB";
    char print3[] = "TIE";
    char M[28],S1[102],S2[102],Hash[28],Hash1[28],Hash2[28];
    scanf("%d",&T);
    getchar();
    gets(M);
    for(i=0; i<26; i++) Hash[M[i]-97] = i;
    while(T--)
    {
       Alice=Bob=0;  
       for(i=0; i<26; i++) Hash1[i]=Hash2[i]=0; 
       gets(S1);
       gets(S2);
       Len = strlen(S1);
       for(i=0; i<Len; i++) { Hash1[S1[i]-97]++;  Hash2[S2[i]-97]++; }
       
       for(i=0; i<26; i++)
       {
         if(Hash1[i]>Hash2[i]) Alice+=Hash[i];
         else if(Hash1[i]<Hash2[i]) Bob+=Hash[i];
       }
       
       if(Alice>Bob) puts(print1);
       else if(Alice<Bob) puts(print2);
       else puts(print3);
    }
  return 0;    
}
